description: A basic iOS native Swift application template using Salesforce Mobile SDK with MobileSync, SwiftUI, and Combine. This template provides a foundation for building iOS apps that integrate with Salesforce, featuring basic authentication, account listing, and contact management capabilities.

useCase.primary: Basic iOS native app with Salesforce integration
scenarios: Starting point for Salesforce Mobile SDK apps
useCase.when: Use this template when you need to create a basic iOS native app that integrates with Salesforce using Swift, SwiftUI, and Combine.

complexity.explanation: Minimal but functional template with basic Salesforce integration and data management
